ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Switching content type
ygData.msgSnippet: Conceptually, the content doesn t stay the same, even if the message body is byte-to-byte identical. So, no problem here that I can see.

Conceptually, the content doesn't stay the same, even if the message 
body is byte-to-byte identical. So, no problem here that I can see.
